reviewText: All in the Family first aired eight weeks before I was born. I literally grew-up on it. I didn't watch Archie Bunker's Place when it originally aired, but after viewing all nine seasons of All in he Family on DVD, I wanted more. The show (Archie) is good in its own way. Archie's niece, Stephanie and his business partner, Murray, are fine foils for our favorite foot-in-mouth curmudgeon. Seasons 2 - 4 need to be released on DVD. There is a viable audience anxiously awaiting.
